source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenic nighttime shot of Paris. In the foreground, a golden statue on a bridge overlooks the Seine River. The illuminated Eiffel Tower stands in the background, with city lights reflecting on the water. The video is a static image with no subject motion.
